As the measurement matrix is replaced by the Jacobian matrix
H
, the gain
K
calculated from Equation (30) is not the optimal gain. Therefore, the traditional calculation formula for the matrix P cannot be used to update the covariance matrix, and Equation (32) must be used to ensure positive-definiteness and symmetry of P. This is the only way to prevent the filter from diverging, and it is also the only way to guarantee convergence.
